projectPurpose: To serve as the core blockchain layer for the Bittensor network, providing infrastructure for decentralized machine learning by managing consensus, handling transactions, recording network data, supporting sub-networks, and implementing the incentive/reward system.
mainFeatures: Runs Bittensor's consensus mechanism (hybrid PoW/PoS/Proof of Intelligence)
Facilitates value transfer via TAO token
Manages the reward system for decentralized machine learning contributions
Logs critical network data (weights, consensus results, transactions, etc.)
Enables neuron registration, staked weight management, and consensus participation

alternatives.name: Cosmos
mainFeatures: Focus on blockchain interoperability ('Internet of Blockchains')
Cosmos SDK for building application-specific chains (Zones)

alternatives.name: Substrate
mainFeatures: Designed for building Polkadot parachains and standalone chains

alternatives.name: Hyperledger Fabric
mainFeatures: Supports smart contracts in various languages (chaincode)

marketPositioning: Subtensor is positioned as a specialized blockchain layer purpose-built for the Bittensor decentralized machine learning network. Unlike general-purpose blockchain platforms or broader blockchain frameworks, Subtensor is specifically designed to manage the unique consensus, data recording, and incentive mechanisms required for a network focused on decentralized artificial intelligence and the coordination of machine learning models across subnets. Its market position is centered on providing the core decentralized infrastructure for the Bittensor ecosystem, distinguishing itself through its direct support for incentivized machine intelligence and its role as the backbone for the network's dynamic structure.
